Title: BERNEY Watch PENDANT Octagon 2 Tone Checks
Description: BERNEY Watch PENDANT Octagon 2 Tone Checks Swedemom is proud offer this Two-Tone Octagon Miniature Pocket WATCH PENDANT from Berney! One of the premier Swiss watch making families, BERNEY has been manufacturing timepieces of exceptional quality for many years. These exquisite pieces (both CASES and MOVEMENTS) are manufactured and assembled entirely at the factory in La Vallee' de Joux in Switzerland. The round white 15mm dial (face) is signed "Berney," "Quartz," and "Swiss." It bears black ROMAN NUMERALS, hour, and minute hands. The 22mm case features a gold checked pattern held in place with silver screws. The bezel edge is also silver, and it stands out 1mm past the gold edge. This BATTERY OPERATED pocketwatch features an ETA SWISS MOVEMENT and is an HEIRLOOM quality, BRAND NEW timepiece that will be the highlight piece in your jewelry collection. Feel free to contact us for a combined invoice with the shipping discount applied. Swedemoms hours are 8am to 5pm PST Monday-Friday.We are closed on weekends and major holidays.

Charity.Mission: MacHub is a division of Yamhill County Gospel Rescue Mission. MacHub partners with YCGRM to provide needed shelter, support, hope, and job opportunities. MacHub is changing community fund-raising by facilitating the sale of high-value contributions and passing proceeds on to nonprofits in the community. We thank our supporters and we welcome your ongoing support of our efforts!
